data:
Name: PREVENT-IA

Slogan: Empowering Safe Workplaces through AI-Powered Education

Benefits:

* Interactive and personalized learning experience
* Real-time tracking of training progress
* On-site ORP training access and certification
* Multi-platform support and user-friendly interface

Features:

* AI-driven chat for doubt resolution
* Direct links to certification pages
* Content generation from updated sources
* Evaluation of learning outcomes
* Customizable report generation
* Content annotation and verification
* Organization of information by topics/chapters
* Integration of corporate content
* Assignment of training to workers
* User profile management

Architecture:

* AWS infrastructure
* PDF Editor
* Jira
* Email
* Github
* Cloud Computing
* pgVector
* CI/CD
* Autoscaling Groups
* Code Builder
* Web Platform
* Secrets Management
* Python
* REST API
* UI/UX design
* React
* Figma
* Scalability
* GPT

Risks:

* Negative public opinion on AI usage
* Energy consumption
* Dependence on AI model providers
* Unfriendly interfaces
* Lack of feedback mechanisms
* Poor prioritization of functionalities
* Low visibility on social media
* Difficulty in measuring training quality
* AI use regulations

Elevator Pitch:
PREVENT-IA is the perfect solution for companies involved in high-risk activities, aiming to prevent accidents and ensure worker safety. This AI-based training platform offers an interactive and personalized learning experience for Occupational Risk Prevention (ORP). Unlike competitors, PREVENT-IA provides real-time tracking of training progress, on-site ORP training access, and certification. Equip your workforce with the knowledge they need to maintain a safe and productive environment.
